name: TriggerPipeline
description: Triggers a pipeline using a GitLab trigger token for a specific project and branch.

args.name: project_id
args.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the GitLab project (e.g. AdamShannag/test).

args.name: ref
args.description: The name of the branch or tag to trigger the pipeline on.

name: ListIssues
description: Fetches all issues from a specified GitLab project using the GitLab API.

args.name: project_id
args.description: The ID or URL-encoded path of the GitLab project (e.g. AdamShannag/test).

name: CreateIssue
description: Creates a new issue in the specified GitLab project using the GitLab API.

args.name: project_id
args.description: The ID of the GitLab project (e.g. AdamShannag/test).

args.name: issue_payload
args.description: A JSON object containing the issue details, e.g. {"title": "Bug report", "description": "Something is broken"}.
